packageDetails: Immerse yourself in the tranquility of mountain landscapes. This package offers a perfect blend of serenity and adventure, with activities such as hiking, mountain biking, and star-gazing. Stay in cozy cabins, savor local cuisine, and breathe in the fresh mountain air. Discover the magic of the mountains and create lasting memories.
aboutTheTour: Embark on a serene Mountain Escape, where each day unfolds with the beauty of nature. This mountain retreat offers a haven of peace with comfortable accommodations and a range of exciting activities.

tourPlan.description: Upon arrival, take a refreshing nature walk to explore the surroundings and get acquainted with the breathtaking views.
Embark on a thrilling hiking adventure to discover hidden trails and enjoy panoramic views of the mountainous landscape.
Spend a mesmerizing night under the stars, experiencing the magic of the night sky in the heart of the mountains.
